data.title: A Third Two day Virtual Workshop on Develop, Deliver and Assess Online Courses with MOODLE Learning Management System
speakers: Prof. D V L N Somayajulu, Director, Indian Institute of Information Technology, Design and Manufacturing Kurnool
Prof. NARASIMHA SARMA N V S, , Director, Indian Institute of Information Technology Tiruchirappalli
Dr. M V Durga Prasad, Visiting Faculty, Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing, Kurnool
Dr. J. Krishnaiah, Associate Professor, Indian Institute of Information Technology Design and Manufacturing, Kurnool
Dr. Anoop Jacob Thomas, Assistant Professor, Indian Institute of Information Technology Tiruchirappalli
Dr. Dr. N. Renugadevi, Assistant Professor, Indian Institute of Information Technology Tiruchirappalli
topics: Philosophy of Online Learning Management System
feedbacks: The Programme was interactive than a monolog
Participants showing interest to organize VLA course
The programme was useful go get better insight (feedback from who were already using Moodle)
The Programme accomplished its set objectives and was grand success
Programme gave insights and practical exposure about online education, e-content preparation using OER (Open Education Resource) and developing the content by own and delivering the content
Participants encouraged using upon source software to prepare the content.
Various Assessment methods and student engaging methods are explored during the training programme.
suggestions: Training Programme can be extended to 3 days
